payload.query: Build comprehensive Infrastructure domain capabilities. Infrastructure Master responsibilities: resource management, deployment coordination, monitoring oversight, optimization strategies. Deploy specialized infrastructure workers: 1) Monitoring Worker (metrics collection, alerting, performance analysis, integrates with Proxmox, UniFi, Wazuh), 2) Deployment Worker (service deployment, configuration management, rollout strategies), 3) Configuration Management Worker (IaC templates, configuration validation, drift detection), 4) Resource Optimization Worker (right-sizing, cost optimization, performance tuning). Integrate with Proxmox for VM management and UniFi for network monitoring. Build infrastructure-as-code capabilities.
payload.title: PHASE 2.7: Develop Infrastructure Master and Specialized Workers
